channel.title: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around
channel.description: My NPC's will not move no matter what I try, I've tried all of the walking types and even set the parameters in which they can walk. This is a huge deal for me, I have skype and teamviewer if anybody is willing to take a look for me. I would really appreciate this as I have spent several hours researching but I can't find anybody else that has had this problem.

item.title: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around
item.dc:creator: @official_garrscape official_garrscape
item.description:
@official_garrscape wrote:

I’m sure it has nothing to do with the autospawn, I’ve done everything that could be done there.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around

item.title: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

spawn = id x y 0 x-1 y-1 x+1 y+1 1

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around

item.title: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around

item.description:
@official_garrscape wrote:

I know this as well, it does not work either.

item.source: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around

item.title: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

spawn = id x y 0 0 0 0 0 1

Don’t edit the first zero

at the 2 zero’s after the first one add the npc coords of north-east
the last 2 zero’s for south-west

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around

item.title: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around
item.dc:creator: @official_garrscape official_garrscape
item.description:
@official_garrscape wrote:

It doesn’t, I’ve tried everything google and I know at this point.

EDIT: They look like they want to walk, they keep glitching as if something’s holding them back from it.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around

item.title: [Delta] Need help making NPC's walk around
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Here:
spawn = id x y 0 0 0 0 0 1

The “1” should make the npc walk.

Read full topic
